topic.title: Will Trump make it to the general election
topic.body: Will Trump survive to be the republican nominee or will his rallys turn increasingly violent until one of these protesters snaps and takes him out

topic.title: Aliens.... I already know they are real looking for others like myself
topic.body: I've seen some otherworldly stuff up close and personal that most people would not believe. I almost dont even believe. but i saw what i saw. anybody else out there see aliens not just a strange light in the distance im talking right in your face.

topic.title: 10$ Free
topic.body: 10$ of Free Bitcoin who wants it?

2_1FieP4c1gxFme5webFJB9x5ZPBXdR6p3Fs.body: ask your friends/coworkers if they have some to trade with you

2_18sw1reMFB1fpxc4vjfjoCrLaFs8UbMeQH.body:
> [pycole](#comment_81_1KwTTgPRSTHFmmJAFBt6kQfdyNeSM5KJuH): Ease up there, Phil.

aliens are not paranormal. we are aliens to other planets.

then again is it really so hard to believe? we are aliens to every planet but earth. we are currently pushing further and further into the cosmos. if life exists anywhere other than earth they would do the same.... we haven't found an end to space yet, in an infinite space exists infinite possibility for life. and learning

i dont know when but at some point people who thought we were alone in the universe will be viewed in the same manner as those who thought the sun revolved around the earth. like i said i know aliens are real. im just looking for the rest of the ppl who know this

> [basxto](#comment_70_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k): human eyes are everything but trustworthy
> https://media.giphy.com/media/l41lVSjlVFJkrzobu/giphy.gif

you wouldnt say that if you saw what i did. no mistaking no tricks. i know what i saw buddy but thanks for the link
